Kardiopulmonal.message: Exclude ACS, PE, aortic dissection, pneumothorax etc.; ECG, troponin, D-dimer, imaging
Exclude acute HF, pneumonia, PE; CXR, BNP, ABG
Signs of upper airway obstruction; emergency airway
Exclude PE, lung cancer, TB, pneumonia; chest imaging and labs

Neurologisch.message: Suspect meningitis; neuroimaging, LP, empirical antibiotics
Suspect SAH; emergency CT/MRI and LP
Suspect herpes encephalitis; LP and IV acyclovir

Infektiologisch.message: Suspect meningococcemia, DIC; labs and ICU monitoring
Fever in neutropenia is an emergency; empirical AB and isolation
Fever post travel: exclude malaria, dengue, etc.; tropical med eval

Gastrointestinal.message: Exclude colorectal carcinoma or GI bleeding; colonoscopy
Exclude acute abdomen; urgent surgical eval

Urogenital.message: Exclude renal failure, glomerulonephritis; labs and sonography

Rheumatologisch / Dermatologisch.message: Exclude DRESS, SJS etc.; dermatologic/internal eval

Kardial.message: Exclude cardiac causes; ECG, monitoring, echocardiography
Suspect endocarditis; echo and blood cultures

Wirbelsäule / Neurologie.message: Suspect spinal abscess or cauda equina; emergency MRI

Onkologie / Systemisch.message: Consider TB, lymphoma, chronic inflammation; imaging, labs, biopsy
